#summary Installation procedure on Ubuntu 8.04

= Installation =

  * Install http://www.apachefriends.org/en/xampp-linux.html

{{{
tar xvfz xampp-linux-1.7.3a.tar.gz -C /opt
}}}

  * Start xampp

{{{
/opt/lampp/lampp start
}}}

  * Todo: this installation should be secured using

{{{
/opt/lampp/lampp security
}}}

  * Make a web directory for Joomla

{{{
root@frubuntu:/opt/lampp/htdocs# mkdir joomla15
root@frubuntu:/opt/lampp/htdocs# pwd
/opt/lampp/htdocs
root@frubuntu:/opt/lampp/htdocs# cd /opt
root@frubuntu:/opt/lampp/htdocs# chown -R john lampp
}}}

  * Download Joomla and extract to web directory above
